cases.title: McDonald's Boys
cases.name: Toh Hong Huat and Keh Chin Ann
cases.lastSeen: Chin Ann was last seen leaving the school grounds to nearby shops while Hong Huat was last seen by his mother when leaving for school

cases.title: Escorts on Yacht
cases.name: Yeng Yoke Fun, 22, Yap Me Leng, 22, Seetoh Tai Thim, 19, Margaret Ong Guat Choo, 19, Diana Ng Kum Yim, 24
cases.lastSeen: The five young women were reported missing after supposedly attending a party on a cargo ship at the Eastern Anchorage
